entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 21. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning early in the evening and ending before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the evening and overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
